shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the first remote video frame is rendered.

p.codeblock: public void onFirstRemoteVideoFrame(int uid, int width, int height, int elapsed) {}
public virtual void OnFirstRemoteVideoFrame(uint uid, int width, int height, int elapsed)

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the first local video frame is displayed/rendered on the local video view. The application can retrieve the time elapsed (the elapsed parameter) from a user joining the channel until the first video frame is displayed.

pt.props: ios mac android electron flutter cpp cs

plentry.pd: User ID of the remote user sending the video stream.
The size of the video frame.
Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling the method until the SDK triggers this callback.
